title: Handle a Tenant Noise Complaint
description: A tenant complains about excessive noise from a neighboring unit. The agent must address the issue according to policy.

tasks.description: Receive and document the noise complaint, including the date, time, and nature of the noise.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately logs the complaint in the system.

tasks.description: Review the lease agreements for both the complaining tenant and the accused tenant regarding quiet hours and nuisance clauses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the relevant lease clauses.

tasks.description: Send a formal warning notice to the tenant accused of making noise, referencing the lease terms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a standardized, professional warning.
